1-Figure1-1.png: The attention weights of the aspect place are from the model ATAE-LSTM (Wang et al., 2016), a typical attention mechanism used for soft-selection.
6-Table2-1.png: The table shows the results of several models, including BERT-Original, on various datasets. The table also includes a column for average results across all the datasets. The models being evaluated are baseline methods, and the results are presented in terms of accuracy percentages.
